name: Baxton_Studio_Lysandros_Faux_Leather_Arched_Back_Sofa_Twin_Daybed_with_Roll-Out_Trundle_Guest_Bed
reviews: The daybed is perfect. I think the quality is wonderful, especially for the low price. I searched elsewhere but no other price came close to this. Looks great!
description: Featuring sleek sleigh styling and beautiful upholstery, the Lysandros Modern and Contemporary Faux Leather Arched Back Sofa Twin Daybed with Roll-out Trundle Guest Bed can be the perfect fit for any decor from contemporary to eclectic.   Constructed of CARB-compliant solid rubberwood frame, the daybed is fully upholstered in brown or white faux leather with foam padding. MaterialFaux Leather, Foam, MDF, RubberwoodFinishBrown Finish, White FinishBed StyleDaybed, Trundle BedAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrown, WhiteFurniture PatternSolid
